title: Project-Based Mathematics Education Design for HRD Professionals' Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and understanding of basic HRD (Human Resource Development) concepts
context.additional_context: HRD competency development targeted at the mathematics domain, supporting learners in designing education applicable to actual corporate settings.

learning_goals: Acquisition of competency in analyzing educational technology-based math content derived from HRD job requirements.
Enhancement of the ability to design personalized math education projects using learning management systems (LMS) and technological tools.
Development of math education modules that strengthen data-driven decision-making capabilities for managers/leaders within organizations.

resources: Industry-specific case database for HRD job task analysis
Mathematics instructional design templates and tools
Access permissions for online collaboration platform (LMS)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
